thread.title: Hilarious way thieves were forced to return phone
thread.title_full: Hilarious way thieves were forced to return phone

author: Temiloluwa Temiloluwa
title: Hilarious way thieves were forced to return phone
text:
Tweet Source: www.bhphotovideo.com 
An Instagram user has shared the hilarious effort she and her parent put up into helping her recover her stolen phone after five days it was stolen. 
The narrator, Ify Ifezue said her parents threatened the thief with death via text message before he decided to negotiate, eventually collecting less than N20,000 to return the phone. 
She added that the man who was in possession of her phone came with four others, including two policemen to return the phone.
